channel.title: half-marathon training plan on LIMINAL RUNNER
channel.description: Recent content in half-marathon training plan on LIMINAL RUNNER

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 16/16 | Weekly Update #21
Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 15/16 | Weekly Update #20
item.description: Second to last week is done! The taper is here.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 14/16 | Weekly Update #19
item.description: Only 3 weeks left. This week we have a lot more speed repeat intervals, but a shorter long run.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 13/16 | Weekly Update #18
item.description: Just 4 weeks to go on this Garmin Coach Training Plan! This week had a Time Trial, with new personal bests and the first long run over the 21.1km half marathon distance.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 12/16 | Weekly Update #17
item.description: Long runs are finally getting longer again this week!

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 11/16 | Weekly Update #16
item.description: Last week were only 3 runs, this week were 6!

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 10/16 | Weekly Update #15
item.description: This week had only 3 runs, read on why.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 9/16 | Weekly Update #14
Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 8/16 | Weekly Update #13
item.description: Speed workouts have finally arrived, after 7 weeks!

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 7/16 | Weekly Update #12
item.description: This weeks special is a Time Trial! Find out here what happened!

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 6/16 | Weekly Update #11
item.description: New week with 4 new runs, who expected that?

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 5/16 | Weekly Update #10
item.description: Garmin Coach finally decided to move this training plan into the next stage, but other than new titles for runs, not much changed.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 4/16 | Weekly Update #9
item.description: New week new runs, get your update here!

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 3/16 | Weekly Update #8
item.description: Week 3 of 16 in my Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training plan is completed! This week I also wore the Hoka One One Gaviota 2 for all runs.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 2/16 | Weekly Update #7
item.description: Second week of 16 of my Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training plan done! All the runs and stats below. Also received a pair of the Hoka One One Gaviota 2 that I tried out last week.

item.title: Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Week 1/16 | Weekly Update #6
item.description:
First week of the Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training Plan with Coach Amy is done!
And I tried some new shoes.

item.title: Started Garmin Coach Half-Marathon Training Plan (with Coach Amy Parkerson-Mitchell)
item.description: Yesterday I felt better and thought why not jump right into the Garmin Coach Training plan that I have been reading up on quite a bit. I had my first Benchmark run today for this plan and also got the New Balance 1080v10s that I ordered today.

item.title: Weekly Update #5
item.description:
This will be a short one this week.
Still hurt, still looking at half-marathon training plans and getting new shoes.
